Christchurch intellectually disabled man with a history of violent and sexual offending left homeless https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-intellectually-disabled-man-with-a-history-of-violent-and- Sex-offending-homeless/6X3RLDKIV5F6TLBHDZHWWUCSJI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-intellectually-disabled-man-with-a-history-of-violent-and- Sex-offending-homeless/6X3RLDKIV5F6TLBHDZHWWUCSJI/ Sam SherwoodThe man’s lawyer says the longer he’s homeless the greater the chances he reoffends. Mon, 27 Nov 2023 05:21:50 +0000 The man, who cannot be identified, ended up in a cycle of serious and repeat offending after a childhood rife with abandonment, state care, and serious abuse. Photo / George Heard
